title: Bit from Integration With reCAPTCHA V3
description: Google’s popular anti-spam service, Google reCAPTCHA, has been updated to v3, making it easier for humans to use while protecting against bots more effectively than ever. The new Re captcha v3 works differently from the older version. It no longer relies on the 2D images displayed in an annoying box but instead, based on some factors like the user’s IP address & other previous interaction on the browser, it determines whether it’s human or bot.

frontMatter.title: Bit from Integration With reCAPTCHA V3
